name: Dungeon Dogs
description:
Overview: 

Your a dog in the dungeon with your trusty companion, your hero! Your mission given to you by the Kingdom and the King himself is to defeat all the heretic Felines that lurk in the shadows of this dungeon. Defeat all the cats to claim victory!

================================================== 

Controls:  Tip: Stay close to hero to bark commands.

 1 - Bark Attack 

2 - Bark Block

 3 - Bark Move Player

 E - Pick Up/Drop Sword

 WASD - Movement

 ESC - Leave Game

Wowie Jam 4 Submission
